entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Lanaudière
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:17 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.2°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the morning. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
